author: @httweets
title: Moga admn to set up 15 mini forests - Hindustan Times
text: The Moga district administration has set a target of planting and caring for over five lakh trees and establishing 15 mini forests in the current financial year. Additional deputy commissioner (rural development) Jagwinderjit Singh Grewal announced this during a meeting with various department heads at the district administrative complex at Moga on Thursday. He said that MGNREGA workers in rural areas will dig the pits to plant the saplings and water them for a year. ‚ÄúEach department head has been instructed to immediately demand MGNREGA workers as per their requirements. In urban areas, the work of planting and watering the saplings will be done by the municipal corporation and MC employees or gardeners,‚Äù he said. ADC said that during the upcoming monsoon season, non-governmental organisations (NGOs) will also participate in the campaign to plant saplings. ‚ÄúNGO RoundGlass will plant trees that are over a foot tall, while Sodhi Foundation will plant trees that are over three feet tall so that they can be easily taken care of in the future. The goal is to establish 15 mini forests in the district, and the villages where these forests will be established have been identified. The boundaries of these mini forests will be made of bamboo. The trees that have already been planted will also be taken care of. New saplings will be planted to replace those that have withered away. Public participation is essential to achieve this goal, as every citizen has a moral responsibility to contribute to making their surroundings green,‚Äù he said. He said out of the total, 1.50 lakh saplings will be planted by the forest department, while the rest will be planted with the help of other departments.

author: Express News Service
title: AIADMK slams Annamalai for calling Jayalalithaa a Hindutva leader
text:
CHENNAI: Former minister and AIADMK‚Äôs organisational secretary D Jayakumar has strongly condemned BJP state president K Annamalai for defaming former chief minister J Jayalalithaa by calling her a Hindutva leader.
In a statement, Jayakumar said Jayalalithaa was above caste and religion. She was an inclusive leader who respected people of all religions and she ensured Tamil Nadu remained peaceful even when other states witnessed violence after the demolition of Babri Masjid.
Jayakumar‚Äôs statement came in the backdrop of Annamalai‚Äôs recent remarks in an interview that former AIADMK supremo was a ‚Äúfar superior‚Äù Hindutva leader and the BJP was trying to fill the void in Tamil Nadu‚Äôs politics left by her demise.
Jayakumar said Jayalalithaa governed the state based on Dravidian principles. Former minister RB Udhayakumar also said there must be a hidden agenda behind Annamalai‚Äôs statement
Expelled AIADMK leader VK Sasikala also criticised Annamalai, calling his remarks a display of ignorance.

author: Samara Cinobio
title: Bom dia, Sexta-feira Santa! Veja mensagens aben√ßoadas para enviar nesta sexta-feira da paix√£o
text:
P√ÅSCOA Bom dia, Sexta-feira Santa! Veja mensagens aben√ßoadas para enviar nesta sexta-feira da paix√£o Confira lindas e belas mensagens em homenagem √† sexta-feira santa
Cadastrado por Samara Cinobio
Publicado em 29/03/2024 √†s 5:00 Not√≠cia X Not√≠cia √â o fato ou acontecimento de interesse jornal√≠stico. Pode ser uma informa√ß√£o nova ou recente. Tamb√©m diz respeito a uma novidade de uma situa√ß√£o j√° conhecida.
Artigo Texto predominantemente opinativo. Expressa a vis√£o do autor, mas n√£o necessariamente a opini√£o do jornal. Pode ser escrito por jornalistas ou especialistas de √°reas diversas.
Investigativa Reportagem que traz √† tona fatos ou epis√≥dios desconhecidos, com forte teor de den√∫ncia. Exige t√©cnicas e recursos espec√≠ficos.
Content Commerce Conte√∫do editorial que oferece ao leitor ambiente de compras.
An√°lise √â a interpreta√ß√£o da not√≠cia, levando em considera√ß√£o informa√ß√µes que v√£o al√©m dos fatos narrados. Faz uso de dados, traz desdobramentos e proje√ß√µes de cen√°rio, assim como contextos passados.
Editorial Texto anal√≠tico que traduz a posi√ß√£o oficial do ve√≠culo em rela√ß√£o aos fatos abordados.
Patrocinada √â a mat√©ria institucional, que aborda assunto de interesse da empresa que patrocina a reportagem.
Checagem de fatos Conte√∫do que faz a verifica√ß√£o da veracidade e da autencidade de uma informa√ß√£o ou fato divulgado.
Contexto √â a mat√©ria que traz subs√≠dios, dados hist√≥ricos e informa√ß√µes relevantes para ajudar a entender um fato ou not√≠cia.
Especial Reportagem de f√¥lego, que aborda, de forma aprofundada, v√°rios aspectos e desdobramentos de um determinado assunto. Traz dados, estat√≠sticas, contexto hist√≥rico, al√©m de hist√≥rias de personagens que s√£o afetados ou t√™m rela√ß√£o direta com o tema abordado.
Entrevista Abordagem sobre determinado assunto, em que o tema √© apresentado em formato de perguntas e respostas. Outra forma de publicar a entrevista √© por meio de t√≥picos, com a resposta do entrevistado reproduzida entre aspas.
Cr√≠tica Texto com an√°lise detalhada e de car√°ter opinativo a respeito de produtos, servi√ßos e produ√ß√µes art√≠sticas, nas mais diversas √°reas, como literatura, m√∫sica, cinema e artes visuais.
Sexta-Feira Santa 2024 - Freepik A Sexta-feira Santa , conhecida tamb√©m como sexta-feira da Paix√£o, representa o momento da crucifica√ß√£o de Jesus Cristo.
Neste dia, os crist√£os reservam um momento para refletir sobre o sacrif√≠cio de Jesus na cruz. Em rever√™ncia √† sua dolorosa morte f√≠sica, muitos crist√£os optam por abster-se de carne e praticar o jejum.
Em honra a este evento significativo na vida de Jesus na terra, selecionamos algumas mensagens especiais para esta Sexta-feira Santa .
VERS√çCULO DE P√ÅSCOA: MENSAGEM com VERS√çCULO DA RESSURREI√á√ÉO DE JESUS "Neste dia sagrado, somos lembrados do amor imensur√°vel de Deus por n√≥s. Que a Sexta-feira Santa nos inspire a viver com compaix√£o, perd√£o e humildade, seguindo o exemplo de Jesus Cristo."
"Que a Sexta-feira Santa nos lembre do sacrif√≠cio supremo de Jesus e nos fortale√ßa na f√©, na esperan√ßa e no amor. Que possamos encontrar conforto na promessa da ressurrei√ß√£o e na reden√ß√£o que ela traz."
"Que nesta Sexta-feira Santa possamos contemplar a cruz de Cristo n√£o apenas como um s√≠mbolo de sofrimento, mas tamb√©m como um sinal de esperan√ßa e salva√ß√£o. Que possamos encontrar paz e renova√ß√£o em sua infinita miseric√≥rdia."
Chama no Zap üëãüèª Receba not√≠cias na palma da sua m√£o.
Clique aqui e entre agora mesmo no nosso canal exclusivo do WhatsApp "Que a Sexta-feira Santa nos convide a refletir sobre nossas pr√≥prias cruzes e dificuldades, lembrando-nos de que, assim como Jesus, podemos encontrar for√ßa na f√© e na entrega total a Deus."
"Que nesta Sexta-feira Santa possamos estar unidos em ora√ß√£o, meditando sobre o sacrif√≠cio redentor de Jesus e renovando nosso compromisso de segui-lo com devo√ß√£o e amor em todos os momentos de nossa vida."

author: Rob Abruzzese
title: Crime continues to decrease in Brooklyn: Major reduction in shootings and homicides in 2023
text: Crime continues to decrease in Brooklyn: Major reduction in shootings and homicides in 2023 Brooklyn District Attorney Eric Gonzalez announced significant progress in reducing gun violence in the borough in 2023, with shooting incidents and victims dropping by about 25 percent, equating to 150 fewer shooting victims compared to the previous year. Additionally, homicides decreased by almost 10 percent, and overall serious crimes saw a reduction of more than 5 percent. These positive trends in public safety have been accelerating over the past three years, marking a reversal from the spike in gun violence during the peak of the COVID pandemic and returning to low crime levels not seen since before the health crisis. The Brooklyn DA‚Äôs Office credited its focus on violent street gangs, partnering with community organizations, and enhancing prosecution efforts for gun offenses. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre seeing a real impact in our efforts to keep Brooklyn safe,‚Äù said District Attorney Gonzalez. ‚ÄúThe reduction in gun violence is particularly notable, with shootings and shooting victims down by a quarter and homicides by 10 percent. These aren‚Äôt just statistics; they represent lives saved and communities strengthened.‚Äù In 2023, Brooklyn recorded 337 shooting incidents, down from 449 in 2022, and 397 shooting victims, down from 544. There were 15 fewer murders, with a notable decrease in gun homicides, which constituted 63 percent of the total number of murders this year. This ratio is similar to the record lows of 2018 and 2019 when homicides involving shootings were at 64 percent. Significant gains were observed in Brooklyn North precincts, particularly in Brownsville‚Äôs 73rd Precinct, where murders dropped by 67 percent and shootings by 30 percent. Other areas like East New York and Bedford-Stuyvesant also saw substantial declines in shootings. Greenpoint experienced an 87.5 percent decrease in shootings, while southern neighborhoods like Sheepshead Bay and Coney Island recorded drops of 71.5 percent and 55.6 percent, respectively. Overall, gun violence in public housing developments fell by 41 percent. The seven major index crimes in Brooklyn decreased by 5.1 percent in 2023. Burglaries were down by 18.4 percent, grand larcenies by 7.2 percent, reported rapes by 6.1 percent, and robberies by 4.2 percent. However, there were slight increases in felony assaults and grand larceny auto. The DA‚Äôs Office‚Äôs efforts included the indictment of 32 alleged gang members, including drill rapper ‚ÄúSheff G,‚Äù and initiatives focused on prevention, such as domestic violence programs and gun buyback events. Brooklyn‚Äôs Conviction Review Unit continued to address past miscarriages of justice, exonerating three individuals in 2023. These statistics, based on the NYPD‚Äôs preliminary CompStat reports as of Dec. 24, 2023, reflect a concerted effort by the Brooklyn DA‚Äôs Office, the NYPD and community partners. Leave a Comment

author: Redacci√≥n Semana
title: Estos los cabecillas de la Segunda Marquetalia beneficiados con la suspensi√≥n de las √≥rdenes de captura
text: Los primeros que aparecen en la lista, incluida en la resoluci√≥n del pasado 12 de abril firmada en la Fiscal√≠a y que suspenden las √≥rdenes de captura contra los cabecillas de la llamada Segunda Marquetalia, son justamente los integrantes de la mal nombra c√∫pula de esa organizaci√≥n criminal. Se trata de Giovanni Andr√©s Rojas, alias ‚ÄòAra√±a‚Äô, principal cabecilla de la estructura ‚ÄòComandos de Frontera‚Äô, Jos√© Vicente Lesmes, conocido como ‚ÄúWalter Mendoza‚Äù, tercero al mando de la Segunda Marquetalia y Jos√© Aldinever Sierra, alias el ‚ÄòZarco Aldinever‚Äô; este ser√≠a el segundo de alias Iv√°n M√°rquez. Los tres gozan de un listado de cr√≠menes que requieren de dos p√°ginas para enumerarlos y que se queda corta con la cantidad de v√≠ctimas de sus acciones. Son investigados por concierto para delinquir, desplazamiento y desaparici√≥n forzada, secuestro, homicidio, tortura, reclutamiento il√≠cito y hasta tr√°fico, fabricaci√≥n o porte de estupefacientes. En adelante est√°n varios integrantes de ese grupo criminal con un prontuario de delitos que la Fiscal√≠a abri√≥ en varios expedientes y en el pa√≠s dej√≥ decenas de v√≠ctimas. Entre otros aparece William Danilo Malaver, alias Gerson Gonz√°lez, segundo al mando de la columna Vlad√≠mir Steven de la Segunda Marquetalia, con investigaciones y √≥rdenes de captura por delitos como secuestro extorsivo, concierto para delinquir y rebeli√≥n.En listado tambi√©n aparece Alberto Cruz Lobo, alias Enrique Marulanda, ser√≠a uno de los hijos de Manuel Marulanda V√©lez, alias Tirofijo, con varios procesos por el delito de concierto para delinquir. Luis Andr√© Figueroa, alias Popeye, tiene en su contra al menos 18 procesos por delitos como terrorismo y homicidio agravado. En la resoluci√≥n de la Fiscal√≠a tambi√©n aparece el nombre de Allende Perilla Sandoval, alias Allende, cabecilla de las disidencias de las Farc en el Pac√≠fico, y que por un tiempo fue dado por muerto, pero apareci√≥ en un video de la organizaci√≥n criminal. Jos√© Darley Malag√≥n Jim√©nez, alias Uriel, cabecilla del frente Iv√°n R√≠os, de la Segunda Marquetalia y con orden de captura por los delitos de homicidio y tr√°fico, fabricaci√≥n o porte de estupefacientes. Finalmente, el √∫ltimo en la resoluci√≥n es Henry Qui√±ones Angulo, con orden de captura por concierto para delinquir y fabricaci√≥n, tr√°fico y porte de armas de fuego. La Fiscal√≠a asegur√≥ que aun con la suspensi√≥n de las √≥rdenes de captura, las investigaciones continuar√°n sin problema. Es decir, avanzar√°n en las audiencias que est√°n pendientes, en los juicios que se est√°n adelantando y de ser necesario obtendr√°n las condenas correspondientes, as√≠, quienes resulten sentenciados, hagan parte de la mesa de di√°logos con el Gobierno Nacional. Llam√≥ la atenci√≥n que en el listado de integrantes de la Segunda Marquetalia, para suspender las √≥rdenes de captura, no aparece alias Iv√°n M√°rquez, supuesto m√°ximo cabecilla de esa organizaci√≥n criminal. Algunas Fuentes advirtieron que por temas de seguridad no se incluy√≥ entre quienes har√≠an parte en la etapa preliminar de los di√°logos de paz.

Ferguson rises above adversity to stand out on football field Allan Brown Leader-Telegram sports Allan Brown Author email Sep 5, 2024 Sep 5, 2024 Updated 17 mins ago Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Tay Ferguson‚Äôs love for football and dedication to the game has resulted in him having a highly successful high school gridiron career for Eau Claire Memorial.
Dennis Steinke Eau Claire Memorial‚Äôs Tay Ferguson runs after catching against Eau Claire North last season.
Payton Havermann Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save Part One. Most athletes gradually realize that adversity comes with the game. The successful ones are those who learn to deal with hardship and rise above it.
Tay Ferguson has done both.

author: @WABI_TV5
title: Pope Memorial gets donation match to help animal‚Äôs medical needs
text: Pope Memorial gets donation match to help animal‚Äôs medical needs THOMASTON, Maine (WABI) - Pope Memorial Humane Society in Thomaston is getting a big financial boost! A $75,000 matching gift is being donated to Pope‚Äôs Sherman Medical Fund. The fund was created in 2020 to honor a kitten named Sherman and his siblings. At just four weeks old, the kittens were rescued from a fire and needed immediate care for burns, smoke inhalation, and singed fur. This gift matches every dollar donated up to $75,000 which could mean a $150,00 donation in total. These funds would ensure lifesaving treatment is available to all homeless pets facing medical challenges. ‚ÄúJust the fact that our donors are so committed to helping us take care of these animals, it means the world to us. We take in, oh goodness, about 1,400 animals each year. And, you know, pretty much every single one needs medical in some form, whether it‚Äôs a vaccine or spaying and neutering. You never know if there‚Äôs gonna be an amputation or what other medical needs, but there‚Äôs a lot and this the Sherman Medical Fund is what that‚Äôs here for everyone,‚Äù said Kasey Bielecki, Pope Memorial‚Äôs Marketing and Public Relations. To learn how you can donate, volunteer, foster, or adopt your new furry friend, you can go to [https://www.popehumane.org/](https://www.popehumane.org/) Copyright 2024 WABI. All rights reserved.
